<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Network Discovery Bulk Device Node Graph Updates</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/pub/v4.0/network/ndNodeGraphBulkUpdate"}></MethodEndpoint>



Bulk device node graph updates for network discovery devices
